topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5364799763687238b3a70000#post_5364799763687238b3a70000
Cause the afghanistan and iraq wars were legal and went through the legal processes needed.  The war on Ukraine would violate this.  Also wars for land grabs are illegal also.  You can't just go to the international comity and file to go to war to take over someone's lands without it being illegal. . . .
(gruff old voice) War has changed.  War has changed.  It's no longer about two countries fighting over land or resources.  It's about legal red tape.  Paper documented motions for war on documented legal cases put forth to committees.  It's about legal control of the international committees.

But in all seriousness if you're a first or second world country that starts a illegal war with another first or second world country that's a quickfire way to piss people off.  Picking on third world countries is fine, but Russia's done a modern day war faux pas of ignoring the international community.  I'll admit the paperwork is all for show and it's pretty much useless, but still if you don't go through with it you're going to piss people off and not the whinny kind of people, but the people who also have guns also kind of people.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53647d0863687223516f0000#post_53647d0863687223516f0000
[bq="uc9"]"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5364799763687238b3a70000#post_5364799763687238b3a70000
Cause the afghanistan and iraq wars were legal and went through the legal processes needed.  The war on Ukraine would violate this.  Also wars for land grabs are illegal also.  You can't just go to the international comity and file to go to war to take over someone's lands without it being illegal. . . .
(gruff old voice) War has changed.  War has changed.  It's no longer about two countries fighting over land or resources.  It's about legal red tape.  Paper documented motions for war on documented legal cases put forth to committees.  It's about legal control of the international committees.

But in all seriousness if you're a first or second world country that starts a illegal war with another first or second world country that's a quickfire way to piss people off.  Picking on third world countries is fine, but Russia's done a modern day war faux pas of ignoring the international community.  I'll admit the paperwork is all for show and it's pretty much useless, but still if you don't go through with it you're going to piss people off and not the whinny kind of people, but the people who also have guns also kind of people.[/bq]
No offense. But all I see here are international political double standards. If one country is allowed to go to war with another, then everybody should be allowed to. None of this, "We can wage war on others. But *you* can't" BS.
No, I do not support whatever Russia is doing to Ukraine. And I wish this could've been resolved in a more quicker and civil manner. But I'm just pointing some things out.
